name: Jamzone
description:
Jamzone is a game where you play as a drone that has to infiltrate a secret base.

To avoid these intrusions, jammers have been placed, making your traversal of the level much harder.

Your goal is simple: reach the top secret documents.

Each jammer will block the communication of a single command (up, down, left, right)  and you'll have to find a path to navigate to the documents.

Everything is made by us, except the font. The pixel font is Thaleah by TinyWorlds, which has a CC-BY 3.0 license and is available here.
